import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from 'axios' class Registro extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { nome: '', email: '', senha: '', telefone: '', sexo: 'M', turma: 'A' } this.submit = this.submit.bind(this) } submit() { axios.post('http://localhost:3001/registro', { nome: this.state.nome, email: this.state.email, senha: this.state.senha, telefone: this.state.telefone, sexo: this.state.sexo, turma: this.state.turma }).then(() => { alert('Registro feito com sucesso!') }) } render() { return (
SIGEN
